hero.heading: 1SONiA is a Restaurant, Celebrity Medical and Auto services

restaurant.heading: 1SONiA Restaurant
restaurant.text: Through the mobile app you can find out the addresses of restaurants, dishes, their prices and book a table in advance. There are 4 sections in the restaurant:

problem.text2: 4 sections in 1 app. Download the app from Google Play and Apple Store
